data.name: WhiteLily 2：梦醒少女 - 梦醒少女＆丽丽公主的精美壁纸
data.detailed_description:
【DLC description】
This DLC is the CG Wallpapers for Princess Lili and Waking up Girl.
After purchasing and downloading, please open the installation directory of waking up girl, and then open the "Wallpaper" folder.

Note: Each wallpaper has the logo of the game and the artist's signature. If you mind, please don't buy it.


【DLC list】
Adapt to computer screen resolution:
1280x768、1366x768、1440x900

Wallpaper name list:
01. Waking up girl - publicity CG Wallpaper
02. Waking up girl - The ending of Marie's CG Wallpaper
03. Waking up girl - Meet Lydia's CG Wallpaper
04. Waking up girl - The Dessert House's CG Wallpaper
05. Waking up girl - Hugging and Crying's CG Wallpaper
06. Waking up girl - The ending of Lydia's CG Wallpaper
07. Princess Lili - publicity CG Wallpaper
08. Princess Lili - Lili & Allen's CG Wallpaper
09. Princess Lili - Cindy & Allen's CG Wallpaper


Thank you for your support and wish you a happy game!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (64bit)
  • Processor: 1.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

Minimum:

mac_requirements.recommended:

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

data.legal_notice:
Copyright Notice:

1. The copyright of this game has been registered and is protected by the Chinese Copyright Law. Unpacking or re-publishing this game is prohibited.

2. All the picture materials of this game are original materials, which are protected by the Chinese Copyright Law. Unpacking and use are prohibited.

3. Part of the music used in this game is commercially licensed material, the copyright belongs to the original author, and it is forbidden to use it without permission.

Any legal issues arising from the violation of the above statement shall bear the consequences.
